Uses of Class
cea.util.monitoring.MonitoringDetector

Packages that use MonitoringDetector 
Package Description
cea.streamer  
cea.util.monitoring  

  • Uses of MonitoringDetector in cea.streamer

    Fields in cea.streamer declared as MonitoringDetector 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private MonitoringDetector ProcessorReader.monitoringDetector
    Detector for deviation in results evaluations (metrics) while monitoring.

  • Uses of MonitoringDetector in cea.util.monitoring

    Subclasses of MonitoringDetector in cea.util.monitoring 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CuSumDetector
    Detector based in Cumulative Sum (cusum) algorithm Detection based on the whole accumulated data https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CUSUM We only consider metrics with one evaluation output (no multi-output evaluation metrics allowed)
    class  CuSumDetectorOnLine
    Online detector based in Cumulative Sum (cusum) algorithm Detection based on the current data https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CUSUM We only consider metrics with one evaluation output (no multi-output evaluation metrics allowed)
    class  ThresholdDetector
    Detector based in thresholds Per observed metric: When the value goes above a specified threshold (absolute value) for more than robustness iterations, an alarm is raised https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CUSUM We only consider metrics with one evaluation output (no multi-output evaluation metrics allowed)
